virtual int sxsdk::shader_interface::get_default_map_mode ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns the default projection value.

Valid when needs_projection() returns true and the projection method can be selected.

Projection methods are: 0=X, 1=Y, 2=Z, 3= wrap mapping, 4=all, 5=disk, 6=sphere. The default is 3 (wrap mapping).

virtual bool sxsdk::shader_interface::needs_tangents ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns whether or not the tangents are needed.

If true is returned, get_dPdu() and get_dPdv() become valid.

virtual bool sxsdk::shader_interface::needs_to_sample_bump ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns whether or not bump image sampling is needed.

If true is returned, sample_bump() become valid.

virtual bool sxsdk::shader_interface::needs_to_sample_image ( void *  aux = 0  )  [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Returns whether or not image sampling is needed.

If true is returned, sample_image() become valid.

void *  aux = 0 
) [inline, virtual]

Overridable. Generates the data space each shader uses independently, and returns that pointer.

Generates a shader_info_base_class derived class with new. It is not necessary to delete from the plugin.
